assessment_item.title: LBL4IZ Q25.எது உண்மை?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

எது உண்மை?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

தளப்பொருள் பாஸ்பரிகரணத்தை உண்டாக்குவது PEP பைருவேட்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1759"},{"text":"

PS II ஆக்சிஜன் உற்பத்தி செய்யும் கூட்டுப் பொருளை கொண்டுள்ளது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1760"},{"text":"

NADPH ஒரு தன்மயமாக்கும் திறனுடையது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1770"},{"text":"

இவை அனைத்தும்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1775"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LBL4IZ Q25.எது உண்மை?","title":"LBL4IZ Q25.எது உண்மை?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
